item.title: Full post
item.description: Ciao, (x) and x_2 and $x_2$ is my var. $$ y = x^2 + \frac{x}{x+1} $$ $$ y = x^2 + \frac{x}{x+1} $$ now some super code anima = [xx**2 for xx in range(22) if xx%2] if 3>2: print(anima) bye
